page.content: One of the major events of the year in the village is the annual Eisteddfod. It is held at the end of May and draws competitors,for the major events of best soloist and instrumentalist,from many miles away. { It is held in the village hall and {a large audience,particulary for the {evening sesssion,usually attends. Planning for the eisteddfod begins in November when groups meet as sub- committees to decide on competitions,prizes and judges.Judges {may travel from Mid or South Wales to {take up an invitation and are often {highly respected academics in their {field. { } Traditionally,the event takes place on Saturday with the morning session involving the younger children. { {
